price: [Magsasabi si Allāh]: “Magtapon kayong dalawa sa Impiyerno ng bawat palatanggi na mapagmatigas,
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
